<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Separation">77355d1887658210354abaa6cebb35db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:52c1255487a58210354abaa6cebb3559</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>glide date test</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var ga = new GlideAjax('ValidateDateFieldsUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','checkDateEnteredPast');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_date', newValue);
	ga.getXML(ValidateDateResponse);
}
alert(ga);
/*
function ValidateDateResponse(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	// If the date is less than the current date, display a field level error message
	if(answer == "false"){
		g_form.showFieldMsg('separation_date', "The date/time you entered is an invalid format, the current date or after the current date", 'error');
		g_form.setValue('separation_date', '');
	}
}
*/]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-10 12:57:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4eab09e88729c210354abaa6cebb3596</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>glide date test</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_1327411_hr">3d6f82d42f30021012d324c62799b661</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">3d6f82d42f30021012d324c62799b661</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4eab09e88729c210354abaa6cebb3596</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-11 13:45:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
